name: Jackson Design Studio.
tagline: Be yourself. Everyone is already taken
description:
Jackson Design Studio is a design agency based in Derbyshire, Manchester & Lancashire. We also provide services across the UK and Internationally. Formed through the love of designing and building wonderlicious websites, logos and mockups
They are a group of freelance web designers, developers and wordpress specialists who strive for excellence in their development of beautiful, timeless brands for existing or startup companies
